quote_first: But I couldn't get out of the house straight away because he would see me, so I would have to wait until he was asleep. The time was
quote_last: I tried doubling 2s again, but I couldn't get past 2(15) which was 32,768. So I groaned to make the time pass quicker and not think.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon
